name: Stuck in time (Fox Game Dev, Patricia Lazaro, Alejandro Royo, RabidTunes)
name_original: Stuck in time (Fox Game Dev, Patricia Lazaro, Alejandro Royo, RabidTunes)
description:
Stuck in time

Solve the mistery of Barlow manor and escape before you go mad.

Features Story-driven

Detective Fulton is trapped in an inhabited manor with 4 other people. There is a glowing door with strange glyphs and symbols, and the entrance door is sealed with what looks like magic.

Who did this? How did this people, who did not know each other, ended up in the same place at the same time?

The door is sealed, there is no other exit and no one knows where any of you are. There is only a path you can take, a path through time.

Unique characters

Meet 5 characters who evolve with time!

  • Detective Fulton: a young detective with an insatiable ambition and world fame. He can't afford to waste time because the detective convention is in 3 days!
  • Ariana Acken: a meek secretary that panicks at the speed of light.
  • Dean Harrington: an accountant at a prestigious law firm. He seems to have detective Fulton in high regards.
  • Brock Nye: a family man that only ever thinks of his family and meatballs.
  • Holly Chester: a local medic super-dedicated to her job. She is never satisfied with you and has a mean streak.
Solve puzzles that span through time

See your actions have consequences in the future! Travel through time and set it all up, time will do the hard work for you.
